thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 5 of 110
thread.title: focis748

author: focis748
title: focis748
text:
I have been using their services in multiple Cities and it is fantastic. I use the star ratings and reviews to pick my caterers, which has delivered great options and a great outcome.
Recently I did have an extreme delay with a delivery and the customer service team was exceptional. I did not have to ask for my situation to get escalated to a manager, they did that for me and continued updating me until the order was delivered!
Shout out to the Customer Service team that handled Las Vegas deliveries on 1/23! I truly appreciated you!
